titleInfo.title: Leslie Howard and Norma Shearer in "A Free Soul"

mods.abstract: In "A Free Soul," alcoholic lawyer Stephen Ashe (Lionel Barrymore) takes on the case of dashing gangster Ace Wilfong (Clark Gable). Ashe's daughter Jan (Norma Shearer) soon falls in love with Wilfong, and the pair run away to New York. Concerned for his daughter's safety, Ashe seeks her out and strikes a bargain%3A he'll stop drinking if she'll leave Wilfong. Both renig, and Jan returns to Wilfong. He has become brutal, however, and tries to molest her. She is saved by her ex-fiance, Dwight Winthrop (Leslie Howard), who murders Wilfong and is arrested. Jan begs her father to defend Winthrop, and Ashe confesses to the murder himself so that Jan and Winthrop can stay together. This confession leads to his own death at the hands of Wilfong's vengeful gang. "A Free Soul" was remade as "The Girl Who Has Everything" with Elizabeth Taylor in 1953.
